short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ranks tweets based on how well thought they are using Gemini-1.5-flash.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweet Thought Ranker is a Chrome extension that ranks tweets based on their thoughtfulness and uniqueness. 

Key Features:
- Multiple LLM Options: Select from different large language models (LLMs) to rank tweets, tailoring the analysis to your preferences.
- User-Defined Ranking Criteria: Input your own criteria for ranking tweets, customizing the score based on what matters most to you.
- AI-Powered Ranking: Each tweet receives a score from 0 to 10, reflecting its level of thoughtfulness, creativity, and depth.
- Customizable Filtering: Choose to hide low-ranking tweets, allowing you to focus on high-quality content.
- Efficient Batching: Tweets are processed in batches to optimize API usage and ensure smooth performance.
- Visual Indicators: Colorful rank displays help you quickly identify the most thought-provoking tweets.
- Pause/Resume Functionality: Take control of when you want tweets to be ranked.

Tweet Thought Ranker helps you cut through the noise on X, surfacing tweets that are actually relevant.

*The icon has been designed using resources from Flaticon.com.
